Johar Ali | leader_title1 = Deputy Commissioner | leader_name1 = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 758.06 | area_metro_km2 = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 694090 | population_as_of = 2011 census | population_rank = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_demonyms = | population_note = | demographics_type1 = | demographics1_footnotes = | demographics1_title1 = | demographics1_info1 = | timezone1 = BST | utc_offset1 = +06:00 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = 8400 | website = | footnotes = | blank_name_sec1 = HDI (2018) | blank_info_sec1 = 0.672 · 2nd of 21 }} Jhalokati or Jhalokathi () is a district in South-western Bangladesh. It is a part of the Barisal Division. ==Subdivisions== The district is administratively subdivided into 4 upazilas, these are: #Jhalokati Sadar Upazila #Kathalia Upazila #Nalchity Upazila #Rajapur Upazila ==References== Category:Districts in Barisal Division
